texto: performance indicators • Process capability indicators Assessment Input ASSESSMENT • Assessment sponsor • Assessment purpose • Assessment constraints • Assessment responsibilities • Additional information to be collected Figure 6 — Process improvement ISO/IEC TR 15504-7 provides guidance on using software process assessment as part of a complete framework and method for performing software process improvement in a continuous cycle although there is no reason why the organization could not employ the guidance for a single cycle of improvement activity.
